text: God's will is an idea in Abrahamic religions on what God wants to happen. Christians, Jews and Muslims believe that they should do God's will. In the Bible, God's will is for all people ton turn to him (repent) from their sins and live with him forever in Heaven. Christians believe that to do so, they must accept Jesus, God's son, into their lives. http://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=john+3:16 Different Christians have different interpretations of what God's will is. ==Related pages== * Destiny * Salvation * God in Christianity ==References== ==Other websites== *BibleGateway.com Category:Theology
title: God's will
